bibl.title: The "phulakes" of the Serapeum in Roman Alexandria.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II
bibl.author: Miller, Martin C.J.

bibl.note: The figures on the obverse of a bronze coin of L. Verus (Dattari 3803) are guards which patrolled the environs of the temple.
bibl.seg: Miller Martin C.J., The "phulakes" of the Serapeum in Roman Alexandria.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II (Athens, 1988) pp. 223-227, 1 pl.
